title: Lincoln's WARNING #100017: Social Media Algorithm Changes
script: Social Media Algorithm Changes... Another headline, another cycle. Bread and circuses for the digital age. Feed 'em outrage, keep 'em scrolling, harvest the data, sell it to the highest bidder. You ain't the customer, you the CROP. Bitcoin below. Social Media Algorithm Changes? Bread and circuses for the modern age. Keep you scared, keep you spending. That's the formula. See through it. Bitcoin below.
